📚 Learn More About CreditRiskPro

This application is a capstone project developed during a 3-month course on Machine Learning Fundamentals with Incubator Hub and Data Science Academy (DSA).

What You'll Learn Here
  • How credit risk is assessed using machine learning
  • What features influence creditworthiness
  • Tips to improve your credit score
  • How to interpret model metrics like precision, recall, and ROC AUC

We believe in empowering users with knowledge — not just predictions. Explore the dashboard, understand your results, and take action to improve your financial profile.
